This is an upscale full service hotel on the waterfront
It was my first trip with my husband as a family and this hotel ruined our first day
Our high corner room facing the river and city was immaculate and nicely appointed
1: But management seriously needs to get it is act together

Again spoke to nice front desk clerk whose manager Paris approved my move
Let me tick off a few good reasons for you to try your hardest to find somewhere else to stay first the place is old
Breakfast was surprisingly good but expensive
The stay while not for pleasure was enjoyable
Dear read I had do everything I could to avoid this place

7 dollar beers that are not even pint glasses rooms okay
Was there for business but I could see spending a few days there for fun
